scripts.test:mochawesome: npx cypress run && npx mochawesome-merge cypress/mochawesome-report/*.json > mochawesome-merged.json && npx mochawesome-report-generator mochawesome-merged.json && npx open-cli mochawesome-report/mochawesome.html
